entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 03:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -36.2°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -39.2°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
